titles.title: Strength Of My Heart (takes a little work)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Strength of my heart I need not fail Not mine to fear but to obey With such a leader who could quail Thou art as Thou wert yesterday Strength of my heart I rest in Thee Fulfill Thy purposes through me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hope of my heart though suns burn low And fades the green from all the earth Thy quenchless hope would fervent glow From barren waste would spring to birth Hope of my heart oh cause to be Renewals of Thy hope in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love of my heart my streams run dry O Fountain of the heavenly hills Love blessed Love to Thee I cry Flood all my secret hidden rills Waters of love oh pour through me I must have love I must have Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord give me love then I have all For love casts out tormenting fear And love sounds forth a trumpet call To valiant hope and sweet and clear The birds of joy sing in my tree Love of my heart when I have Thee{/lang-eng}
